item.description:
UPDATE: All of the scheduled slots have been filled with players who've emailed me and signed-up for slots. If you'd like to show up and see if slots open, or if we get enough folks to run a second group in a particular time slot, I can't promise prizes, but we'll do what we can.


Original Post: Hi, everyone. We had such a good time running this last year that we're going full tilt into it again. So join Andy, Matt, Chris, James, and possibly other DMs for a day of D&D adventure.

The setting: Icewind Dale in the Forgotten Realms. Five adventurers set off on a quest. For their pains, their players will earn special RPGA Campaign Cards, and possibly other prizes as well.

We intend to have slots running at Noon, 2 PM, 4 PM, and 6 PM. Because there's only limited numbers of DMs and playing space, please sign-up for the event by emailing Andy at paulie_mayhew [AT] hotmail [DOT] com We'll do our best to accommodate all walk-ins as well.

Hope to see you there!

- Andy

group.name: The Boston Dungeons & Dragons Meetup Group

item.name: Worldwide D&D Game Day @ Pandemonium Books & Games
